html: <tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='lg' path='header.title' label='Title' show-if="header.enabled == true" />
<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-edit' size='md' path='header.textHtml' label='Subtitle' placeholder='Add subtitle text' show-if="header.enabled == true" />

<tooldrawer-field type='segmented' size='md' path='header.alignment' label='Alignment' options='[{"label":"Left","value":"left"},{"label":"Center","value":"center"},{"label":"Right","value":"right"}]' show-if="header.enabled == true" />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='cta.enabled' label='Show CTA button' />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='md' path='cta.label' label='CTA label' show-if="cta.enabled == true" />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='lg' path='cta.href' label='CTA link' placeholder='https://example.com' show-if="cta.enabled == true" />
<tooldrawer-field type='segmented' size='md' path='cta.style' label='CTA style' options='[{"label":"Filled","value":"filled"},{"label":"Outline","value":"outline"}]' show-if="cta.enabled == true" />

<tooldrawer-field class='diet-object-manager' type='object-manager' path='strips' add-label='Add strip' reorder-label='Manage strips' reorder-title='Manage strips' label-path='logos.0.name' index-token='__STRIP__' default-item='{"logos":[{"name":"New logo","logoFill":"","href":"","targetBlank":false,"nofollow":false,"alt":"","title":"","caption":""}]}' template='<tooldrawer-field type="repeater" size="md" path="strips.__STRIP__.logos" label="Logos" add-label="Add logo" reorder-label="Manage logos" reorder-title="Manage logos" default-item='{"name":"New logo","logoFill":"","href":"","targetBlank":false,"nofollow":false,"alt":"","title":"","caption":""}' template='<tooldrawer-field type="dropdown-upload" size="md" path="strips.__STRIP__.logos.__INDEX__.logoFill" label="Logo" placeholder="Upload logo" accept="image/*,.svg" /><tooldrawer-field type="textfield" size="md" path="strips.__STRIP__.logos.__INDEX__.name" label="Name" /><tooldrawer-field type="textfield" size="md" path="strips.__STRIP__.logos.__INDEX__.caption" label="Caption (hover)" /><tooldrawer-field type="textfield" size="lg" path="strips.__STRIP__.logos.__INDEX__.href" label="Link URL" placeholder="https://example.com" /><tooldrawer-field type="toggle" size="md" path="strips.__STRIP__.logos.__INDEX__.targetBlank" label="Open in new tab" /><tooldrawer-field type="toggle" size="md" path="strips.__STRIP__.logos.__INDEX__.nofollow" label="Nofollow" /><tooldrawer-field type="textfield" size="lg" path="strips.__STRIP__.logos.__INDEX__.alt" label="Alt text" /><tooldrawer-field type="textfield" size="lg" path="strips.__STRIP__.logos.__INDEX__.title" label="Title (tooltip)" />' />' />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='md' path='typeConfig.slider.autoSlideDelayMs' label='Autoplay delay (ms)' show-if="typeConfig.slider.autoSlide == true" />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='typeConfig.slider.pauseOnHover' label='Pause on hover' />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='typeConfig.carousel.pauseOnHover' label='Pause on hover' />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='typeConfig.ticker.pauseOnHover' label='Pause on hover' />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='md' path='spacing.mobileLogoHeight' label='Logo height (mobile px)' />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='md' path='spacing.mobileGap' label='Logo gap (mobile px)' />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='md' path='spacing.mobileStripGap' label='Strip gap (mobile px)' />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='behavior.randomOrder' label='Randomize logo order' />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.logoLook' label='Logo look' value='{{appearance.logoLook}}' options='[{"label":"Original","value":"original"},{"label":"Grayscale","value":"grayscale"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-fill' size='md' path='appearance.itemBackground' label='Tile background' value='{{appearance.itemBackground}}' />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='appearance.itemCard.radiusLinked' label='Link tile radius' value='{{appearance.itemCard.radiusLinked}}' default='true' />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.itemCard.radius' label='Tile radius' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{appearance.itemCard.radius}}' show-if="appearance.itemCard.radiusLinked == true" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.itemCard.radiusTL' label='Tile top-left radius' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{appearance.itemCard.radiusTL}}' show-if="appearance.itemCard.radiusLinked == false" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.itemCard.radiusTR' label='Tile top-right radius' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{appearance.itemCard.radiusTR}}' show-if="appearance.itemCard.radiusLinked == false" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.itemCard.radiusBR' label='Tile bottom-right radius' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{appearance.itemCard.radiusBR}}' show-if="appearance.itemCard.radiusLinked == false" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.itemCard.radiusBL' label='Tile bottom-left radius' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{appearance.itemCard.radiusBL}}' show-if="appearance.itemCard.radiusLinked == false" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-border' size='md' path='appearance.itemCard.border' label='Tile border' value='{{appearance.itemCard.border}}' />
<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-shadow' size='md' path='appearance.itemCard.shadow' label='Tile shadow' value='{{appearance.itemCard.shadow}}' />
<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-fill' size='md' allow-image='false' path='appearance.ctaBackground' label='CTA background' value='{{appearance.ctaBackground}}' />
<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-fill' size='md' allow-image='false' path='appearance.ctaTextColor' label='CTA text color' value='{{appearance.ctaTextColor}}' />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.ctaRadius' label='CTA radius' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{appearance.ctaRadius}}' options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"sm"},{"label":"Medium","value":"md"},{"label":"Large","value":"lg"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"xl"},{"label":"2XL","value":"2xl"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance type='dropdown-fill' size='md' path='pod.background' label='Pod background' value='{{pod.background}}' />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='seoGeo.enabled' label='Enable SEO/GEO optimization' />
